rows.label: bf02150100_0010
rows.name: Homura... She was crying when I met her.

rows.label: bf02150100_0020
rows.name:
Was she brought to life by someone
once, just like a normal Blade...?

rows.label: bf02150100_0030
rows.name: What is the Holy Grail, really?

rows.label: bf02150100_0050
rows.name: Oh dear... Looks like imperial troops.

rows.label: bf02150100_0080
rows.name:
That fugitive in your company is an
enemy of the state! A member of Iira!

rows.label: bf02150100_0100
rows.name:
It's her all right. Gulan Driver,
white beast-form Blade.

rows.label: bf02150100_0110
rows.name: She looks exactly like the wanted poster!

rows.label: bf02150100_0160
rows.name:
Ah, uh, I mean, no way!
This doesn't look anything like...

rows.label: bf02150100_0170
rows.name: Wait, we've got no time for this!

rows.label: bf02150100_0180
rows.name: Who cares if it looks just like her?

rows.label: bf02150100_0210
rows.name: You look like a Driver too. Registration number?

rows.label: bf02150100_0240
rows.name: All new Drivers must register with Acedia!

rows.label: bf02150100_0250
rows.name:
No number means you must be
an illegal, unregistered Driver!

rows.label: bf02150100_0270
rows.name:
You're coming with me! We'll see what
the consul has to say about this!

rows.label: bf02150100_0280
rows.name:
Rex, Byakko and I are gonna make our
move. Get ready to run.

rows.label: bf02150100_0300
rows.name: This is our problem, not yours.

rows.label: bf02150100_0310
rows.name:
I'm pretty sure he wants to arrest all of us.
So this is my problem, too!

rows.label: bf02150100_0320
rows.name: Sheesh, you're a stubborn one, ain't you?

rows.label: bf02150100_0340
rows.name:
Okay, we go on three.
We'll go left, you go right.

rows.label: bf02150100_0400
rows.name:
A-All right, men! We've got them outnumbered -
move in and take them down!
